trans-unit.source: Represents the visual appearance of the control when it is in a specific state.
trans-unit.target: Representa a aparência visual do controle quando ele está em um estado específico.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> specifies how the control looks when it is in a certain state.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> Especifica a aparência do controle quando ele está em um determinado estado.

trans-unit.source: For example, when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is pressed, its border might be a different color than normal.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> é pressionado, sua borda pode ser uma cor diferente do que o normal.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> class has a <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Storyboard%2A> property that changes the appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> classe tiver um <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Storyboard%2A> que muda a aparência do controle.

trans-unit.source: When the control enters the state that is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, the <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Storyboard%2A> begins.
trans-unit.target: Quando o controle entra no estado especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Storyboard%2A> começa.

trans-unit.source: When the control exits the state, the <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Storyboard%2A> stops.
trans-unit.target: Quando o controle sai do estado, o <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Storyboard%2A> para.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.States%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property contains <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.States%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade contém <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objetos.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> objects are added to the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached property, which is defined on the on a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> objetos são adicionados ao <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> anexado a propriedade, que é definida no em um <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objects to any <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, but they are typically are used in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objetos a qualquer <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, mas eles são geralmente são usados em uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> and <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objects for existing controls, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> e <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objetos para controles existentes, consulte [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).

trans-unit.source: For an example of using <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objects outside of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo do uso de <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objetos fora de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager> classe.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> called `CommonStates` and adds <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objects for the states, `Normal`, `Pressed`, and `MouseOver`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> chamado `CommonStates` e adiciona <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objetos para os estados, `Normal`, `Pressed`, e `MouseOver`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> also defines a state called `Disabled` that is in the `CommonStates`<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>, but the example omits it for brevity.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> também define um estado chamado `Disabled` no `CommonStates` <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>, mas o exemplo omiti-lo para fins de brevidade.

trans-unit.source: For the entire example, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para o exemplo completo, consulte [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualState" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualState" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualState" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome de <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualState" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualState" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualState" />.

trans-unit.source: You specify which visual state an element should enter by passing the <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> to the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>.
trans-unit.target: Você especifica qual estado visual de um elemento deve inserir passando o <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Name%2A> do <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> para o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> uses the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, the control author should specify which <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objects the control expects to find in its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> by putting the <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute> on its class signature.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> usa o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager> em uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, o autor do controle deve especificar qual <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objetos controle espera encontrar no seu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> colocando o <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute> em sua assinatura de classe.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> authors define new <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objects and set the <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Name%2A> property to the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> autores definem novos <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objetos e defina o <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Name%2A> o valor especificado pela propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To find the names of the visual states for the controls that are included with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], see [Control Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: Para localizar os nomes dos estados visuais para os controles que estão incluídos com [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], consulte [modelos e estilos de controle](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-styles-and-templates.md).

trans-unit.source: For information about how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> and <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objects for existing controls, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> e <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objetos para controles existentes, consulte [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> called `CommonStates` and adds <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objects for the states, `Normal`, `Pressed`, and `MouseOver`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> chamado `CommonStates` e adiciona <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objetos para os estados, `Normal`, `Pressed`, e `MouseOver`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> also defines a state called `Disabled` that is in the `CommonStates`<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>, but the example omits it for brevity.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> também define um estado chamado `Disabled` no `CommonStates` <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>, mas o exemplo omiti-lo para fins de brevidade.

trans-unit.source: For the entire example, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para o exemplo completo, consulte [Personalizando a aparência de um controle existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> that defines the appearance of the control when it is in the state that is represented by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualState" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> que determina a aparência do controle quando ele está no estado representado pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualState" />.

trans-unit.source: A storyboard that defines the appearance of the control when it is in the state that is represented by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualState" />.
trans-unit.target: Um storyboard que determina a aparência do controle quando ele está no estado representado pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.VisualState" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: When the control enters the state that is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, the <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Storyboard%2A> begins.
trans-unit.target: Quando o controle entra no estado especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Storyboard%2A> começa.

trans-unit.source: When the control exits the state, the <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Storyboard%2A> stops.
trans-unit.target: Quando o controle sai do estado, o <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Storyboard%2A> para.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a simple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that contains one <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um simples <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> que contém um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> called `MouseOver` has a Storyboard that changes the color of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> from green to red when the user puts the mouse over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> chamado `MouseOver` tem um Storyboard que muda a cor do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> de verde para vermelho quando o usuário coloca o mouse o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> called `Normal` is included so that when the user moves the mouse off the button, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> returns to green.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> chamado `Normal` está incluída para que quando o usuário move o mouse fora do botão, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> retorna para verde.
